title: [24/96] Stanley Clarke - School Days (1976) - 2011, Vinyl Rip
description:
Stanley Clarke - School Days (1976) - 2011

EPIC / Friday Music 180g LP, FRM 439, 88697654461

USA LP, Vinyl Rip, 24/96, FLAC (tracks+.cue)

Thanks aksman

 02 - Quiet Afternoon (05:09)
 03 - The Dancer (05:27)

 Side B

 02 - Hot Fun (02:55)

All tracks composed by Stanley Clarke
